dmca.title: Cease adn Desist
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: George J. Stoulil [mailto:gstoulil@africast.com] 
Posted At: Monday, July 10, 2006 3:05 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Cease adn Desist
Subject: Cease adn Desist


ThePlanet.com
Attn: George Poletes, Corporate Counsel

Dear Mr. Poletes,

It has been brought to our attention that your firm is hosting the
website telediaspora.net.  Please find a copy of our email sent to
ghanaweb.com demanding they cease and desist from streaming the
television programming originating from Ghana Television in Ghana.
Actually gnanaweb.com is providing a link for their viewers to access
the streaming content at telediaspora.net.  We, at Africast Global
Media, Inc., have the exclusive rights to rebroadcast the programming
from Ghana Television, as stated in the attached letter from Ghana
Television.  We have not granted anyone the rights to further broadcast
this programming.

Please terminate the aforementioned program signal from your server.


Sincerely yours,


George J. Stoulil



-----------------------------------------------------------------------
June 27, 2006

TO:  Mr. Rob Bellaart
     Mr.Francis Akoto
     GhanaWeb
     Poederooienstraat 66
     1106 CK Amsterdam
     Netherlands

SUBJECT: Cease and Desist

Gentlemen,

This email is to request you to stop streaming the news from Ghana TV on
your website immediately.  We at Africast Global Media Inc. have the
sole and exclusive rights to stream all programming from Ghana
Television.  We do not grant you, nor does GTV grant you, the right to
stream any of GTV's programming on your website ghanaweb.com or any
other website you may be affiliated with.  You have 24 hours to comply
with this demand or we will be forced to bring legal action against you.
We are also pursuing Telediaspora in this matter.


Sincerely,


George J. Stoulil
COO
Africast Global Media, Inc.
606 Post Road East, No. 638
Westport, CT 06880
Cel: 206-290-6500
Tel: 203-862-0210
Fax: 203-402-0407
www.africast.tv
